heading: Small and medium-sized enterprises in the EU facing skill shortages
subheading: 39% of the interviewed EU-based small and medium-sized companies (SME) totally or somewhat agree that skill shortages hold their company back in greening business activities
textNote: Fieldwork was conducted via telephone interviews from 4/5 to 24/5/2023, 12 909 interviews were conducted. Representative sample of business was selected.
